body.name: Sleepavo Navy Blue Memory Foam Seat Cushion for Office Chair - Cooling Gel Pillow for Sciatica Coccyx Back Tailbone and Lower Back Pain Relief - Chair Pad Lumbar Support in Office, Car, Airplane

features: Help alleviate sciatica and lower back pain: Sleepavo’s coccyx pillow has been ergonomically designed to help take pressure off of the user’s lower back or tailbone and offers orthopedic tailbone pain relief while sitting. This gel cushion promotes healthy posture and proper spinal alignment.

Ergonomically shaped with pressure-relieving cut out: The U-shaped design, with its cut-out center and contoured surface, removes pressure from the coccyx to ensure the tailbone hovers over the surface of the seat, thereby alleviating any discomfort caused by sitting for extended periods.

Cooling gel memory foam seat cushion: This coccyx cushion is made from high-quality memory foam to offer comfort and to help relieve back pain, tailbone pain, and sciatica. Layered over the memory foam is a padding of cooling gel meant to keep users cool and comfortable throughout the day. This cushion is ideal for office chairs, wheelchairs, airplanes, or for use in a car. Great for short and long trips.

Includes washable cover, anti skid bottom and carrying handle: This pillow features a zippered, removable mesh cover that is completely machine washable to make cleaning easier. The case also features a non-slip, rubber bottom to ensure the cushion will stay firmly positioned in a seat and a convenient handle for easy transport.

Use in the office or while traveling: Each coccyx pillow measures 18” x 14” x 3” and is great for travel. Each cushion comes with a full three-year warranty that protects against any damage or defects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a great buy since I spend alot of time at my desk. Typical office chair cushion goes flat after time so this is perfect to provide that needed support and relieves pressure off your back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best cushion
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a few different cushions over the years, and this brand is the best. Sturdy yet comfortable. And of course a pink cushion is always great for anyone who loves pink!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good support
reviews.reviewText: Be sure to sit all the way back - tailbone needs to be directly over the opening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for longer flights
reviews.reviewText: I used this on a flight from Boston, MA to London, UK. Usually when I get off the flight I have tailbone pain for a few days, but using this cushion made a night and day difference. It is a little wide for the seats so you do have to squish it a little, and it is very unwieldy to get through the airport with, but worth the challenge! Also, I am a larger person (5'9", 250lbs) , but was still able to put my seatbelt on no problem.Looking forward to using it with my desk chair, but haven't tried it yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No more pain, very comfortable, I can sew all day long now and not feel it later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft but small for driving
reviews.reviewText: I got this for driving, I sit in a bus most of 8 hours during a day and although this is super soft and cushy it is not deep enough for a bus or even a car seat. Your thighs hang over the front edge and it creates a pressure point. I tried it in my jeep as well, no dice. I would return it but I already wrote my name in black sharpie on the side. I kinda bought this one because of reviews and that it was pink and wouldn't blend in with the actual black seat so I wouldn't leave it in the bus and night. Back to the drawing board. Note the depth and get the right size or you will be sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my special needs Niece for her chair at school. It has a handle so she can take along with her to class & lunch. She said her hips & back don't hurt anymore 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I drive a truck for work, but I’m a small guy, so I bought this to give me a better view of the road. It’s much more comfortable and cooler than the seat I have it on. The grey color I chose actually matches the seats perfectly. I’m very happy with the quality. There are cheaper pads available, but I wanted one that would last.

The cushion is incredibly comfortable, I struggle with back pain/tailbone pain at work and I used it today at work and just with 1 day noticed a significant difference. The cooling feature is incredible as well, I’d recommend this to anyone.
